name: Dune (itch) (Simple Anaconda)
description:
In the game you need kill sufficient quantity monsters for win.

In arsenal you have blades, cutter, teleport, push away module and suit.

Suit can break, so he needs spare parts to fix himself. Also, suit can cure you, but it will need medicines for this. Suit has energy for use teleport, jerks and cutter. You can get all this by killing relevant monsters (and not quite).

That is all. 

Good luck!

                     Controls:

Q - Quit

W, A, S, D, SPACE - Move

W/A/S/D + Alt - Jerk

1, 2 - Weapons

LMB - Attack

RMB - Push something away

F - On/off teleport

Middle mouse button - To teleport

Music by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio
